name: GIMGUMHO
description:
Hey hey hey !

Here's our game for the Lundum Dare #41 ! The theme was to combine two incompatible genres...

This Tower Defense / Run & Gun game ! Well, it's our first Jam and we hope you will find it cool !

The Version 1.1.1 was released on May the 7th 2018 : With it, new menus, help elements, end of the game, death & win screen, better images, adjusted sounds volumes, majors & minors bugs fixes... In fact, the game is cooler
